00022 /**
00023  *      \brief  Checking the transmission counter at CUDA device
00024  *
00025  *      Key actions:
00026  *              -# Open CUDA device
00027  *              -# Open gpumem driver
00028  *              -# Allocate three buffers in the CUDA memory
00029  *              -# Mapping buffers in the BAR1 space on CUDA device
00030  *              -# Filling the buffer 64-bit counter via BAR1
00031  *              -# Checking buffer in the CUDA device
00032  *              -# Decimation buffer and transfer to the HOST
00033  *              -# Transfer result of checking to HOST
00034  *
00035  *
00036  *              Steps 5-8 are carried out in a loop
00037  *
00038  *
00039  */
00040 class TF_TestCnt: public TF_TestThread
00041 {
00042 public:
00043         TF_TestCnt( int argc, char **argv );
00044         virtual ~TF_TestCnt();
00045 
00046 
00047         virtual void StepTable( void );
00048 
00049         virtual void PrepareInThread( void );
00050 
00051         virtual void CleanupInThread( void );
00052 
00053         virtual void Run( void );
00054 
00055         virtual void GetResult( void );
00056 
00057         //! Number of arguments
00058         int     m_argc;
00059 
00060         //! Pointers to arguments
00061         char** m_argv;
00062 
00063 
00064         int m_SizeBufferOfKb;   //!< Size buffer [kbytes]. Must be n*64
00065 
00066         int m_CountOfCycle;             //!< Number of cycle. 0 - infinitely
00067 
00068 
00069         struct TaskData         *td;            //!< Local data for test
00070 
00071     CL_Cuda                             *m_pCuda;       //!< Cuda device
00072 
00073 
00074     //! Fill buffer in Cuda memory via BAR1
00075     void FillCounter( CL_Cuda::BAR1_BUF *pBar1 );
00076 
00077     //! Print results for buffer
00078     void GetResultBuffer( int nbuf );
00079 
00080 };
